questions.text: The state of the Hedera blockchain can be updated without submitting a transaction.

answers.explain: As with any other blockchain, updates to the network state must come in the form of a valid and authorised transaction, which nodes agree on through a consensus algorithm. A transaction is needed for a state change to occur.
Without transactions, no state changes may occur.
